turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I need to order a pizza order from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Three small pizzas, one Cheese, one Veggie lover's, and one Pepperoni.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 3 small pizzas, 1 Cheese, 1 Veggie lovers, 1 Pepperoni, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. And I need those to be gluten-free crust, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, i'll add that to the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $39, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm going to pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your pizzas will be ready in 35 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. Nope. That's it. Thank you so much.
